snippet: The director David Ayer’s film “End of Watch” continues his exploration of police officers in the Los Angeles neighborhood where he grew up.
abstract: Director David Ayer, who has shot several movies about the crime-ridden South Central neighborhood of Los Angeles where he grew up, continues his exploration in his latest cop drama End of Watch.
lead_paragraph: The director David Ayer’s film “End of Watch” continues his exploration of police officers in the Los Angeles neighborhood where he grew up.

headline.seo: David Ayer’s ‘End of Watch,’ in Los Angeles Grit
headline.main: Cops Under the Palms: A Director’s Obsession
headline.print_headline: Cops Under the Palms: A Director’s Obsession
